programme.title: World's Most Beautiful: Wedding Gowns
programme.sub-title: The World's Most Beautiful: Wedding Gowns
programme.desc: What's a wedding without an incredible dress?! Prepare to be wowed by these wedding gowns.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: Love is love—and while every couple is eligible to win any Wedding Film Award, this award is specifically designed to spotlight the inspiring love of our LGBTQ+ couples through a film that is as timeless as it is alluring. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.

programme.desc: From gay, floral-filled estate affairs to boho lesbian desert weddings, get inspired by these celebrations that prove love really is love.

programme.title: World's Best Wedding Venues
programme.desc: Join us in Episode 2 of World's Best Wedding Venues to learn about unique wedding venues Lac La Belle and Aurora Farms.

programme.title: Award-Winning Weddings
programme.desc: We're always looking for up-and-coming talent. This category is designed to recognize a fresh filmmaker on the scene who has nonetheless demonstrated exceptional filmmaking skills and pushed the creative envelope in our industry. This episode contains finalists from the 2024 Wedding Film Awards.
